title: Flight 93 National Memorial: Virtual Tour
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Virtual Tour              Virtual Tour       Orientation Videos                         The Flight 93 Story An introduction to the story of Flight 93  Duration:6 minutes, 52 seconds                                The Memorial Design Learn about the history of the memorial and take a sweeping bird's eye virtual tour that provides an overview of both completed and future features of the design.  Duration:3 minutes, 20 seconds                                Visiting the Memorial The forty engraved marble panels of the Wall of Names, the stark black wall that marks the debris field, and a simple sandstone boulder are just a few of the elements that honor the passengers and crew of Flight 93. Learn about what to expect when visiting the memorial.  Duration:3 minutes, 16 seconds                                The Passengers and Crew View a montage of the passengers and crew of Flight 93  Duration:2 minutes, 22 seconds               Preview Video - 2011                       Flight 93 National Memorial - Preview - Summer 2011 Preview - Flight 93 National Memorial, Summer 2011.  Duration:4 minutes, 52 seconds               Design Competition Video - 2004      This video was created for the design competition packet. It provides glimpses of lands that now make up the memorial as the design competition was just beginning. Flight 93 National Memorial Virtual Tour (31.3MB wmv file) Quicktime version ( 30.6MB mac file)
